website_summaries.verdict: Light up his eyes with these light-up sneakers.
pros: Fixed elastic lacing with hook-and-loop closure
Comes in black-citron, grey-green and red-black
cons: Only one side of the shoe lights up

customer_reviews.title: Had to zap the lights
customer_reviews.text: Love Stride Rite shoes for their wide fit for my son. Should have read the description closer because we didn’t realize they lit up! He was quite embarrassed and didn’t want to wear them outside of home. Google search netted 3 seconds in the microwave and problem solved, seriously. Thankfully, because he loves everything else about them.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Wide is not very wide!
customer_reviews.text: Stride rite shoes are the only ones I can find that are wide enough for my son. So I was excited to find these at a great price in the Wide width. Strangely, they were not wide enough. He has another pair of Stride rite shoes in an 11.5W that fit perfectly. So I ordered these in a 12W and couldn't even get them on his foot. Even take them out of the box I could tell they were not as wide as his other shoes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter who is starting to outgrow her size 13.5 Stride Rite Leepz. We made the jump to a size 1 (next size up). When they arrived she immediately loved the color and tried them on. She said they were tight and hurt her toes. Figuring she just didn't have her foot in all the way, I double checked. Her toes were hitting the front of the shoe. These are SMALLER than a size down sneaker that she's currently wearing and much more narrow despite being the same type of shoe (Leepz). Not sure what's going on with their sizing as Stride Rite used to be consistent. Unfortunately, had to return.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was disappointed that it only lights up on the outside of ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was disappointed that it only lights up on the outside of the foot, not the inside. Be careful though--the Leepz shoes come in a "summer" version also. I apparently ordered a summer version in another color for my boy--all the parts between the "leather" are not very fine mesh. He wouldn't even be able to walk across wet grass without getting his socks wet. Sand at the park? Dirt on the baseball field? What a disaster. To the summer version I give one star.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable, and bright. Get an extra pair!
customer_reviews.text: Nice big toe box, which was a hard thing to find. And these hold up well, we ended up going ahead and picking up a second pair in a larger size. They light up easily, are lightweight, and just generally great shoes. I'm waiting on another sale to get yet another set when the latest pair is outgrown.
customer_reviews.author: Nada Chance

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow for wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is blessed with my fat, flintstone feet, so narrow shoes dont fit well. These are a little more narrow than others, so she complained that they were tight. However, i always order a shoe size up, so with some use, I am sure she will break them in and they will fit more comfortably with time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love Leapz from stride rite, our daughter has been wearing these for a few years and she loves them. She is balanced and well gripped in these shoes. This is our 3rd pair in 3 years :-) amazing shoes!!! She is a little clumsy and these shoes help her so much!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the colors and the lights on the bottom. She has been wearing them to school for half a year now, which includes recess, and they are holding up well. No holes or signs of hard wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Humpula

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love Stride Rite sneakers! They are supportive and are of great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amara Sage

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is too small, soles not flexible
customer_reviews.text: The size of these was a full size too small. The soles were not flexible like other Stride Rite products. Returned them and ordered better Stride Rite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: droth

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We love the shoes. This is our second pair. Stride rite is consistently a good product so we keep coming back. This style is a favorite of my child. We had another pair of the lights worked for a long time, unlike other brands which often wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brooks Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Held up well to rough use. Still lights up even when getting wet! My son loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! I got these for$15! My daughter loves them. She says that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Logo

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter Loved these shoes. They seem durable. Love the look - like bubbles on the bottom that light up. Fit nicely and she can put them on herself.
customer_reviews.author: beckyw

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My a Granddaughter loved her new shoes! The color was awesome and the fit was perfect! Will definitely by them again!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, match with anything, light up, and they didn't fall apart after months of abuse from a 6 year old. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wright

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these shoes and I love them even more for it's high visibility given the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and I love them even more for it's high visibility given the lights and the color. Glad I finally found the right size for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: C.N.

customer_reviews.title: Solid sneaker with great traction and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great solid kids sneaker with good rubber traction on soles. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Thal

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT place in dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT put in a dryer..... it literally fell apart. LARGE chucks of rubber just fell off of different parts.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely reorder
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her light up shoes and these did not disappoint. The soles seem to hold up better than most Stride Rite shoes we've had lately.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Got a pair for both my girls and they fit perfect. The girls love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Nilsson

customer_reviews.title: ... rite outlets are gone but they still make the best kids shoes you cannot go wrong with a kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Stride rite outlets are gone but they still make the best kids shoes you cannot go wrong with a kids shoe and with them growing so much these prices are good
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my daughter. Good price. Like that it lights up.
customer_reviews.author: Smoke1201

customer_reviews.title: Good durability
customer_reviews.text: The price!! The fit is good too and the durability in these shoes are better than other brands!!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: ... these shoes and thinks they make him jump higher like the commercial shows
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these shoes and thinks they make him jump higher like the commercial shows! They are very good quality and awesome lights around.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old daughter is very picky when it comes to comfort and she loves these sneakers. Color is also very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Mc

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite new shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite new shoe. Light and comfy. Only thing that could make it better would be a longer strap for the Velcro fastener.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Love them. There so cute.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. She tells me they are very comfortable. Wear and tear excellent. Very well made and they are so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Clio Raven

customer_reviews.title: Don't stand up well over time
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fell apart after about six months of use. The Velcro on both sneakers tore and the area around the toes and the edge of the foot opening frayed.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, fit nice, strong velcro, comfy and the kids don't fall as often.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Roy

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: We love stride rite shoes and it seems like amazon is one of the fews places that you can get them from. The size and quality are great. My son plays HARD in them and they are still holding strong!
customer_reviews.author: azarember

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe overall, washable, but still hard to keep fabric clean looking
customer_reviews.author: JLewis

customer_reviews.title: Only One Side Lights
customer_reviews.text: He loves his leepz but I don’t like that they don’t light up on both sides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stride Rite!
customer_reviews.text: The only sneaker we buy for our LO who’s now 4. They do wear down a little quickly but she’s rough on shoes anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Vickilou

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Good fit. Expect the top knit of the shoe to show wear quickly...lint balls developed
customer_reviews.author: TTurn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, durable shoes. Love the Leepz series, fit my son’s wide foot quite comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Soots

customer_reviews.title: grand D loves them !
customer_reviews.text: 5 yr old grand daughter loves these, the lights are awesome...
customer_reviews.author: Dalene Gustkey

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. No big changes from last version except the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. No big changes from last version except the bubble/light up areas are a little slimmed down so the shoe is a little lighter. These are our 4th pair across both kids. They love them for all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Daughter loves them. Will likely hold up through the school year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a perfect fit. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. My daughter like she them and they are athletic looking. Good purchase for my daughters wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and comfortably! Grandson reports that he runs faster!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look even cooler in person and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Rian Gurvis

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers for a little girl. She loves them and the velcro is easy to pull tight. Only downside is that the blue parts on the bottom only light up on the lateral side of her feet, not the medial side.
customer_reviews.author: Young Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Entire shoe does not light up
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Only the outside lights light-up, unlike the Sketchers shoe wherein the entire sole lights up and puts on a light show for a cheaper price. The same design bubbles are along the inside curve which gives the impression that they light up just like the outside lights but they are just for show I guess. Would love to return them but my son loves them and doesn't notice or care about the deficient design.
customer_reviews.author: dmoore

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with sneakers with lights
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these, not only are they comfortable but he loves the lights. The bulges are great because he can see the lights without bending over or needing a mirror and they make the lights seem huge.
customer_reviews.author: G R

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Kids' Leepz 2.0 Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Your little athlete will tread light-ly toward the practice field in the Leepz 2.0 sneaker by Stride Rite. With easy adjustability and soles that light up with every step, your big kid will run and play in comfort and with confidence.

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
mesh linings with anti-microbial treatment reduces odor
alternative closure with hook & loop for easy on/off and adjustability
memory foam insole for enhanced comfort
